StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetCandidateCriteriaWaiver]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
(@CandidateCriteriaWaiverID int)
AS
SELECT [CANDIDATE_WAIVER_ID] ,[PROGRAM_ID] ,[MOS] ,[AFQT] ,[GT] ,[EL] ,[MM] ,[CL] ,[HEIGHT] ,[AGE] ,[COLOR_PERCEPTION] ,[VISION] ,[WPMT] ,[APT] ,[EDPT] ,[DLAB] ,[PAOI] ,[MEOP] ,[HIGHEST_WAIVER_LEVEL] ,[SERIOUS_MORAL_OFFENSES] ,[MARIJUANA_USE] ,[ALGEBRA_GRADE] FROM [dbo].[CANDIDATE_CRITERIA_WAIVER] WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE [CANDIDATE_WAIVER_ID] = @CandidateCriteriaWaiverID
